column4: anyone know the package name that i gotta pull in in order to get usb mouse and keyboard working for ubuntu 7.04?

does anyone have a work around for ubuntu 7.04 usb & keyboard problem? i am trying to help a friend with it and i dont seem to know why a defualt installation of ubuntu cant detect a usb keyboard and mouse
turn off the "USB keyboard and mouse support" in BIOS
yeh i asked him to check about bios, he said there is no usb option in there, any other way?
search in launchpad, see if it's a known bug
